info.title: BTC RPC NodeChain API
info.description: Docs relating to the BTC RPC API, including the connection to the API of the native node. Its goal is to give the user an easy way to be able to raise their own nodes for use with the native Swapper application.

post.summary: Return the balance of any address
post.description: Return the balance of any address

post.summary: Return the balance of an array of addresses
post.description: Return the balance of an array of addresses

post.summary: Return the transaction history of any address
post.description: Return the transaction history of any address

post.summary: Return the transaction history of the given addresses
post.description: Return the transaction history of the given addresses
Returns latest block hash and index
post.summary: Returns latest block hash and index

post.description: Returns the information of any block giving its hash. If verbosity is 0, it returns a string that is serialized, hex-encoded data for block hash. If verbosity is 1, it returns an object with information about the block. If verbosity is 2, it returns an Object with information about the block and each transaction
post.summary: Returns the information of any block giving its hash

post.description: Returns the information of any block giving its height. If verbosity is 0, it returns a string that is serialized, hex-encoded data for block hash. If verbosity is 1, it returns an object with information about the block. If verbosity is 2, it returns an Object with information about the block and each transaction
post.summary: Returns the information of any block giving its height

post.description: Returns True if blocks are syncing and returns False if theres no synchronization or is fully sychronize

post.summary: Returns the information of any transaction
post.description: Returns the information of any transaction, giving its transaction hash

post.summary: Returns the information of an array of transactions
post.description: Returns the information of an array of transaction, giving its transactions hash

post.summary: Watch an address. Everytime the address changes, a http POST is sent to the URL.
post.description: Watch an address. Everytime the address changes, a http POST is sent to the URL.

post.summary: Returns the number of pending or confirmed transactions an address has made
post.description: Returns the number of pending or confirmed transactions an address has made

post.summary: Returns the information of any transaction
post.description: Returns the information of any transaction, giving it transaction hash
Estimates the approximate fee per kilobyte needed for a transaction to begin confirmation within "confirmations" blocks if possible and return the number of blocks for which the estimate is valid.
Returns the UTXO list of any address

post.description: Returns the UTXO list of an array of addresses
post.summary: Returns the UTXO list of an array of addresses

post.description: Returns raw schema of any transaction. If verbosity is set to true, transaction object is returned, otherwise raw transaction will be returned

post.summary: Broadcasts a transaction to the network
